question: 凄絶
sourceMnemonic: Something really <kanji>terrible</kanji> causing mass <kanji>extinction</kanji> will be <vocabulary>extremely gruesome</vocabulary>. It will also probably be <vocabulary>extremely violent</vocabulary>, so don't look.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You've learned them already, so you should be able to read this on your own!
